name: TheRiverofCalm
0:
”Alexa, start The River of Calm”
”Alexa, play The River of Calm”
”Alexa, ask The River of Calm what is the current song”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the river of calm
des: The River of Calm is Music to Soothe Your Soul. Featuring calming music from over 70 independent Artist as well as news and articles on music and health, music and healing and more. Our calming music is now heard in over 155 countries around the world. Come on and listen - and may the calm be with you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
